decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number(s): 101 (P) Block and Location Plan, 102 (P) Existing Plans, 103 (P) Existing Plans, 104 (P) Existing Elevations, 105 (P) Existing Elevations, 106 (AP) Proposed Plans, 107 (AP) Proposed Plans, 108 (AP) Proposed Elevations, 109 (AP) Proposed Elevations, 110 (AP) Existing and Proposed Sections, 111 (AP) Existing Proposed Sections
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.

| The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), Policies 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).
| The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall be in accordance with the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2)

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
| No part of the flat roof of the dwelling shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies 7A, Local Variation 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1(g), 2.1(c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012) and policy D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Roof extension to rear (main) roof slope incorporating a Juliet balcony; part rear roof extension to rear outrigger roof slope and installation of two roof lights to front roof slope
